doc.field: TODAY IN WASHINGTON FOR WEDNESDAY APRIL 8 (TIMES EST/GMT) NO ECONOMIC INDICATORS... PRESIDENT REAGAN MEETS U.S.-CANADA FREE TRADE GROUP (1000/1400), ADVISORY CMTE ON TRADE NEGOTIATIONS (1400/1800).. BANK GROUP OF 5 FINANCE MINISTERS EXPECTED TO MEET IN MORNING; GROUP OF 7 EXPECTED TO MEET IN AFTERNOON. MINISTERS OF GROUP OF 24 ALSO MEET. COMMUNIQUE IS EXPECTED (NO TIMES)... SENATE INTELLIGENCE CMTE TELEVISED HEARING INTO NOMINATION OF FBI DIRECTOR WEBSTER TO HEAD CIA (1000/1400)... BUDGET DIRECTOR MILLER AT HOUSE APPROPRIATIONS SUBCMTE (1000/1400)...HOUSE OPENS DEBATE ON 1988 BUDGET PLAN (1000/1400)... REUTER
